document.docAuthor: Kim, Chang-Jun, Notton, David G., Ødegaard, Frode & Lee, Jong-Wook
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the Palaearctic species of Ismaridae Thomson, 1858 (Hymenoptera: Diaprioidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the Palaearctic species of Ismaridae Thomson, 1858 (Hymenoptera: Diaprioidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Antenna uniformly bright yellow in female, pale brown to dark brown in male; mesopleuron with deep longitudinal wrinkles in both sexes, T2 with median furrow, at least to ¾ of segment in both sexes.

materialsCitation.collectorName: Sm & Smaland & Bhn & C. H. Boheman

paragraph.materialsCitation: SWEDEN : ♀ , “ Sm ” [ Småland ], “ Bhn ” [ C.H. Boheman leg.], “NHRS-HEVA 000003606” ( NHRS ). Lectotype designated by Kolyada & Chemyreva (2016) .

Reared from
Anteon flavicorne (Dalman)
( Dryinidae ) in France ( Tussac & Tussac 1991 ), Russia ( Kozlov 1971 ), Switzerland ( Wall 1967 ) and United Kingdom ( Chambers 1955 ; Nixon 1957 ). In addition, we have excluded the reference of Waloff & Jervis (1987) , because they were not sure about the identity of the dryinid species (
Anteon flavicorne
or
Anteon arcuatum
) (Olmi, pers. comm.).
